name: NOWPayments For WooCommerce
author: CoderPress

sections.description:
Get Pro | Pro Live Demo | Documentation

NOWPayments for WooCommerce, It’s very easy and simple to use with WooCommerce.
Fully supported by the SCI Intelligencia team with features that are necessary to keep check.

  • Accept 300+ cryptocurrencies converted into the ones you trust.
  • Receive instant payouts to your wallet or bank account.
  • Enjoy 24/7 support and personal account manager.
  • Save on fees: cheapest on the crypto market.
  • Feel the freedom of choice with our variety of tools.

Premium

  • Top 5 Currency Icons on Products
  • Top 5 Currency Icons on Shop page
  • Priority Support
  • Attractive User Interface
  • Easy Setup
  • Open for Suggestions
  • Go Pro
  • Live Demo

Our other plugins

  • Coinbase Commerce for WooCommerce
  • Coinbase Commerce for Contact Form 7
  • Posts and Products Views for WooCommerce
  • Emails Blacklist for Everest Forms

Supported Coins

Coin Name Popular Coins

  • Bitcoin (BTC)
  • Ethereum (ETH)
  • XRP(XRP)
  • Tether (USDT OMNI)
  • Litecoin (LTC)
  • Bitcoin Cash (BCH)
  • Dogecoin (DOGE)
  • Nano (XNO)
  • Monero (XMR)
  • DASH (DASH)
  • Vechain (VET)
  • Uniswap (UNI)
  • Solana (SOL)
  • Cardano (ADA)

sections.changelog:
1.1.2 April 14, 2024

  • Updated🚀 – URLs.

1.1.1 March 23, 2024

1.1 August 12, 2023

  • NEW – Added WooCommerce Block Support

1.0.5 July 20, 2023

1.0.4 June 14, 2023

1.0 July 28, 2022

  • Initial release.
sections.screenshots:
1. Goto WooCommerce > Settings > Payments

  2. Goto https://account.nowpayments.io/store-settings for SandBox https://account-sandbox.nowpayments.io/store-settings

  3. Goto https://account.nowpayments.io/store-settings for SandBox IPN https://account-sandbox.nowpayments.io/store-settings

  4. Copy API and IPN Secret and paste, save.

  5. You're all ready to use NOWPayments
sections.reviews:
Good but not perfect

By alf1985 on December 22, 2023

BTC payments only work at around €39.00, which is far too high for stores that also offer items for €5-10

Many other currencies only work from 4.30€ everything below this price you get an error message in the checkout of the NowPayment page.

I don't quite understand the fees, according to the website 1% for an amount of 1,00€ with LTC you get 0,62€ which is more than 1% deduction for this payment.

Otherwise the plugin works very well, there is a large selection of currencies.

骗子，不是官方应用，扣费严重

By avswitch001 on December 12, 2023

不是nowpayments官方的插件，这是不怀好意的个人仿冒的，界面和官方插件一样，这个仿制的插件额外扣费极高，我已0.5usdt测试，最终仅到账0.16680312 USDT。

Amount sent0.49988114 USDT / received 0.16680312 USDT

请到官方网站下载正版插件nowpayments.io，安装后会显示作者：nowpayments.io 

Super helpful plugin, prompt support!

By eeeeeeehsan on June 16, 2023

This is a next level plugin, so helpful and beneficial for Crypto payments. It helped me a lot!

Plus, their support is extraordinary and fast!

Thank you big time!

Excellent crypto payment plugin once settings are set

By tugfish on February 23, 2023

Once this plugin is setup correctly it works really well. Here is the steps to do this so you can use it properly.

Create Nowpayments account
Add your crypto wallet address and generate an API Key
From NowPayments site set the payment covering and payment markup. If the payment covering isn't set then the payment may show up as partially paid in NowPayments and not fully process in Woocommerce causing the order to cancel.
Install WooCommerce plugin
Go to Woocommerce, Settings Payments. Enable NOWPayments, Fill in API KEY from NowPayments and IPN Secret Key. Copy woocommerce webhook url and paste it into NowPayments website IPN Callback url.

I used XRP to test since it is the fastest and cheapest gas utility coin. I sent 23.8402847 and after fees I received 23.421225 XRP. That is a fee of around 1.7% charged by NowPayments which is much cheaper than Paypal or other credit card processors.

No i can sell fishing lures for crypto currency.

scammers

By rinu25 on November 11, 2022

Scammers Beware, they charge 37% fee on payments: 4631374483 WC-15468 10 USD 10.04 USDTERC20 0.00036205 BTC finished 11 Nov 2022, 05:48 am 11 Nov 2022, 06:11 am From a 10$ payment I only received 6.27$ no one wants such high fee, better use any other similar site for crypto payments They do not know what they are talking about they even present me a hash 0x7c91a815df3a69b1c6ae67b6a67a538034fb9b68ff625919f25bfb8b3130cf96 that has a 15$ fee lol for a 10$ payment in total, it is like I am in debt now and owe them 5$ more, with nowpayments to receive money you will need to give more from your end than original payment, logic. Now they do not answer anymore, they can't provide proofs for their scam

Very good and easy to use

By Ehsan (ehsanfotoo) on August 29, 2022

Very good and easy to use.

Good Crypto Payment method

By ZorroTV (zorrotv) on August 8, 2022

NOWPayment solve my online payment method, its provide easy setup & configuration, fast and very low fees. Thanks and keep the good job

short_description: Allow users to checkout with 300+ crypto currencies.
